name: Gambler's Deck
description:
GAMBLER'S DECK

Both players roll three dice and guess the total.

Whoever gets closer wins.

Game is supposed to be played with mouse. Here are couple shortcuts as well: 

M - toggle music

N - toggle sounds

Music: "Hard Boiled" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Dice sound by AbdrTar (freesound.org)
